programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E18, After 19 years, Kansas detectives reopen the case of a banker found beaten to death in his bed--and the chief suspect is his cheating wife. And a man with a guilty conscience helps Arkansas police to crack a cold case of murder.

programme.title: Missing and Murdered

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Killer in the Storm

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E14, A serial rapist seals his own fate when he sends a taunting letter to police. And when a man is found dead in South Dakota, his head bashed in by a 50-pound rock, investigators go on a 20-year search for the killers.

programme.title: A Lesson in Homicide
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E11, When a schoolteacher is found murdered in her New Jersey apartment in the fall of 2009, suspicion is cast on her soon to be ex-husband. Long after the case goes cold, a detective embarks on a mission to help the man clear his name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Family
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E08, SG-1 goes on a mission to rescue Teal'c's son, Rya'c, from the grasp of Apophis. But, when they finally reach Rya'c, he doesn't want to be saved -- he's been brainwashed and has accepted Apophis as his god! Can Teal'c find a way to win back his son?

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E18, When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Vegas
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E19, In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?

programme.title: Enemy At The Gate
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E20, Puzzled over the hive ship's sudden departure, the team picks up a weak subspace signal in Wraith code. Once deciphered, their worst fears are realized. The Wraith message contains a familiar set of coordinates. The hive ship is on its way to Earth!

programme.title: Air (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E01, When a military research base is attacked, a small group of civilians and military personnel escape on a ship into deep space. But divisions emerge between those who want to attempt a return to Earth and those who want to remain aboard the Destiny.

programme.title: Air (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E02, After secretly contacting Homeworld Command, Dr. Rush (Robert Carlyle) claims that he has been placed in charge by Gen. O’Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and that there is no hope of returning to Earth. But his assertions are soon questioned.

programme.title: Air (Part 3)
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E03, With the air supply failing on the Destiny, a team disembarks to a desert-like planet in search of a mineral needed to scrub the ship's air of carbon dioxide. While one team presses on to find the vital mineral, the other has another goal in mind.

programme.title: Darkness
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E04, The crew has been working throughout the night to try and determine why the ship’s power reserves are critically low. But when Destiny’s flight path towards a solar system reveals three planets, the entire crew hopes that one of them is habitable.

programme.title: Secrets
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E09, The Stargate project is imperiled when a reporter threatens to expose the top-secret portal. O'Neill attempts to stop him while the rest of the team tries to save Jackson's wife who has been impregnated with a Goa'uld. Is this the end of Stargate?

programme.title: Bane
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E10, A giant insect has bitten Teal'c (Christopher Judge) and soon his body will transform into a cocoon and give birth to hundreds of insect aliens. Can the SG-1 team capture one of the bugs, extract the venom and save Teal'c before it's too late?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 1
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E11, Captain Carter unwillingly becomes the host to a dying Tok'ra, a member of the resistance whose noble goal is to overthrow the evil Goa'uld empire. Now she sees through the Tok'ra's eyes, but can her visions help the SG-1 team save the Tok'ra?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 2
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E12, The Tok'ra are desperate for hosts so they can continue fighting the Goa'uld. Carter's father, who is dying of cancer, has nothing to lose by volunteering his body. But will he die during the transference...or does fate have something else in store?
